nodes.text: Kloofus was a male Gran who served as the second-in-command of the transport Skinchanger. The starship was captained by the Clawdite Prit Kessek, a courier who worked for the Zygerrian slavers, and Kloofus accompanied the craft when it traveled to Bazarre, a space station in the Mosu system, to pick up some credits that were to be taken to the planet Zygerria on the behalf of the shipping magnate Brevis Taug.
